game.name: AIKAGI After Days
game.shortDescription: AIKAGI After Days is a visual novel which depicts a young couple enjoying their college life together. If you enjoyed their blossoming love story in AIKAGI, you will love this summer full of dates, swimming, fireworks, travel... and maybe just some studying.
